content: 🇯🇵➡️🇺🇸 The journey back to NYC begins, with my suitcase stuffed with stories and a heart full of sushi. Planning a cultural exchange event to sprinkle some Tokyo magic on the Big Apple!
raw_content: 🇯🇵➡️🇺🇸 Excitement and uncertainty swirl as I head back to NYC from Japan. So much to share and learn from this incredible journey. Planning a cultural exchange event to bring a piece of Japan with me!
